Thaumovoric Eels

8 HP 3 STR, volatile bite (d8)

• Flourishing in Bastion after the advent of electricity; feeds from any source of energy. If captured, are both a delicacy as well as a valuable industrial component.

• On critical damage, the target loses 1d4 CHA and is permanently disfigured by discharged energy.

category: monsters source: discord
